Title: Former Intelligence Officer & Whistleblower
Quote Text: I was informed in the course of my official duties of a multi-decade UAP crash retrieval and reverse engineering program.

Title: Former Intelligence Officer & Whistleblower
Quote Text: Non-human biologics came with some of these recoveries.

Title: Former Pentagon AATIP Director
Quote Text: My personal belief is that there is very compelling evidence that we may not be alone.

Title: Former Pentagon AATIP Director
Quote Text: UAPs represent a potential national security threat unlike anything we have ever faced.

Title: Attorney & UAP Advocate
Quote Text: We are on the verge of the most significant disclosure in human history.

Title: Attorney & UAP Advocate
Quote Text: My client has direct knowledge of crash retrieval operations conducted by the US government.

Title: Investigative Journalist & Author
Quote Text: Some of these objects are not capable of being moved because they're too bloody big... I know exactly where it is… It's absolutely gobsmacking that it's been kept a secret.

Title: Investigative Journalist & Author
Quote Text: Belief is an expression of religious faith... My belief is irrelevant. It is not the case that there is no proof at all behind Mr Grusch's allegations.

Title: Investigative Journalist & Author
Quote Text: There should be an investigation… into what I characterize as the intelligence community's effort to try and discredit a good human being.

Title: Investigative Journalist & Author
Quote Text: I was skeptical about CE5 and summoning UAP craft until I witnessed it with Tier 1 operators who are Psionic Assists trained by the US military…

Title: Investigative Journalist & Author
Quote Text: I don't care if people say this is crazy… I don't care if people laugh or ridicule it, because I know from the sources that I've spoken to, this story will eventually come out.

Title: Filmmaker & UAP Investigator
Quote Text: BOMBSHELL: The Pentagon has more videos. This is just the beginning of disclosure.

Title: Filmmaker & UAP Investigator
Quote Text: I have obtained videos that will change everything we know about UAPs.
